title: rpc/validator: Not connected to ETH1. Cannot determine validator ETH1 deposit block number
body:
## Description
I'm running PoS Geth and Prysm on Windows following setup instructions from prylabs: https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/install/install-with-scriptand 

My validator was just activated today, but I keep getting an error message in Beacon: 
`WARN rpc/validator: Not connected to ETH1. Cannot determine validator ETH1 deposit block number. I can't figure out what went wrong. `

My validation layer doesn't seem to be working. This is the message from validation: 
`[2023-09-09 13:48:39]  INFO validator: Waiting for deposit to be observed by beacon node pubKey=0x88dc8960e9a0 status=UNKNOWN_STATUS `

Here is the beacon node connectivity status: 
```
curl http://localhost:8080/healthz
*blockchain.Service: ERROR, service is optimistic, and only limited service functionality is provided please check if execution layer is fully synced
*prometheus.Service: OK


*initialsync.Service: OK
*sync.Service: OK
*builder.Service: OK
*rpc.Service: ERROR, service is optimistic, validators can't perform duties please check if execution layer is fully synced
*gateway.Gateway: OK
*p2p.Service: OK
*execution.Service: ERROR, retryExecutionClientConnection: cacheHeadersForEth1DataVote: determineEarliestVotingBlock=18088881: (1694208087 > 1694170703): provided time is later than the current eth1 head
*attestations.Service: OK
```

Here is beacon node - execution node connectivity status: 
```
curl http://localhost:3500/eth/v1alpha1/node/eth1/connections
{"currentAddress":"http://localhost:8551","currentConnectionError":"retryExecutionClientConnection: cacheHeadersForEth1DataVote: determineEarliestVotingBlock=18091936: (1694208087 > 1694207663): provided time is later than the current eth1 head","addresses":["http://localhost:8551"],"connectionErrors":[]}
```

Here is EL syncing status:
```
 eth.syncing
{
  currentBlock: 18100876,
  healedBytecodeBytes: 39627117,
  healedBytecodes: 4803,
  healedTrienodeBytes: 11282746102,
  healedTrienodes: 35121471,
  healingBytecode: 0,
  healingTrienodes: 1108,
  highestBlock: 18100984,
  startingBlock: 18100779,
  syncedAccountBytes: 54344580337,
  syncedAccounts: 228182669,
  syncedBytecodeBytes: 6977533855,
  syncedBytecodes: 1012529,
  syncedStorage: 1030397964,
  syncedStorageBytes: 221823608029
}
```

Can anyone help? I've attached a full troubleshooting report and logs from EL, CL and validation. 


[Validation Log.txt](https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/files/12566451/Validation.Log.txt)
[Execution Log.txt](https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/files/12566482/Execution.Log.txt)
[Beacon Log.txt](https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/files/12566483/Beacon.Log.txt)
[debugging report.txt](https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/files/12566408/debugging.report.txt)

## Environment

### Operating System:
`Windows 11`

### Prysm Version
```
Latest prysm release is v4.0.8.
Using prysm version v4.0.8.
Beacon chain is up to date.
WARN GPG verification is not natively available on Windows.
WARN Skipping integrity verification of downloaded binary
Verifying binary authenticity with SHA256 Hash.
SHA256 Hash Match
Starting Prysm beacon-chain --version
beacon-chain version Prysm/v4.0.8/0ca3644057e27966a446051fe3bc3389a1add54e. Built at: 2023-08-22 18:30:36+00:00
```

### Geth Version
```
Version: 1.12.2-stable
Git Commit: bed84606583893fdb698cc1b5058cc47b4dbd837
Git Commit Date: 20230812
Architecture: amd64
Go Version: go1.20.7
Operating System: windows
GOPATH=
GOROOT=
```
